title: Pride of Florida Recalls Beef Products due to Possible E. Coli O157:H7 Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, Oct. 18, 2019 Pride of Florida, a Raiford, Fla. establishment, is recalling approximately 64,797 pounds of raw beef products that may be contaminated with E. coli O157:H7, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The raw ground beef...
